name: mailcow: dockerized VM
description: The mailserver suite with the 'moo'. mailcow: dockerized is an open source groupware/email suite based on Docker.

notes.text: After the script completes, click on the VM, then on the Summary or Console tab to find the VM IP.
This Script works on amd64 and arm64 Architecture.
After the first login, you need to execute the script /opt/mailcow-dockerized/generate_config.sh to set your custom settings.
